name: Gno Man's Land
description:
GNO GNOMES ALLOWED.

In this simple but fun old-school Tower Defense, plant deadly flowers to defend your Great Tree against invading gnomes! 

Use three different types of plants to stop the gnomes from reaching your Great Tree; each plant with different capabilities. Your limited water supply means you can only plant so many of them, so plan(t) carefully!

 PEA SHOOTER fast as bullets, but less effective; shoots from afar

  CACTUS throws spikes at everywhere; hits all gnomes at a close distance

PEPPER spits fireballs that explode into the roads

Made in 48 hours for the 2023 Global Game Jam!

ART

Rebeca Nigri
